title: 3D Sneak Peek: 3DCP Database structure and system library TU/e
description: This record contains the template and setup information library for the 3D Sneak Peek database. The aim of this project is to collect experimental data about 3D concrete printing in a structured way and distribute this data to the community. This record includes the system library of the equipment at TU/e and the templates for data records and software packages.
